passive.name: SOUL EATER
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) SOUL EATER
                                Gains 8/16/24% (increased by level 1/5/9) Physical Vamp.

q.name: (Q) SIPHONING STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) SIPHONING STRIKE
 7/6/5/4s   15 
                                
                                
                                Empowers next attack within 10 seconds to deal an additional 20 physical damage (20/50/80/110 + 0% ).If Siphoning Strike kills the target, its damage is permanently increased by 5.Killing champions, large minions and large monsters increases Siphoning Strike's damage by 10 instead.

w.name: (W) WITHER
w.description:
(W) WITHER
 14/13/12/11s   80 
                                
                                
                                Slows enemy Movement Speed by 35% and Attack Speed by 22.5/30/37.5/45% for 5 seconds. TheÂ Movement Speed slow increases to 45/60/75/90% over the duration.

e.name: (E) SPIRIT FIRE
e.description:
(E) SPIRIT FIRE
 12s   110/120/130/140 
                                
                                
                                Creates a flaming zone, dealing 55 magic damage (55/110/165/220 + 40% ). The zone persists for 5 seconds, dealing 11 magic damage (11/22/33/44 + 12% ) over time and reducing Armor by 20/25/30/35%.

r.name: (R) FURY OF THE SANDS
r.description:
(R) FURY OF THE SANDS
 75/70/65s   100 
                                
                                
                                Enchances himself to gain 300/450/600 Health, 40/50/60 Armor and Magic Resist for 12 seconds. Deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal 3% (3/4/5% + 0.01% ) of their Health during the duration.Siphoning Strike's cooldown is reduced by 50% during the duration.The storm deals a max of 240 damage per second.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

example_build_detailed.passive: Winter's Caress: Reduces the attack speed of nearby enemies by 15%
example_build_detailed.description: Defensive item that provides armor, mana, and CDR while reducing enemy attack speed. Great against AD-heavy teams.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
